mapper.sql: id,type,time, title, detail, creator_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time, is_del, link_url,newcode
mapper.select:
select
from proj_dynamic_info where newcode = #{newcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_del =0
mapper.insert: insert into proj_dynamic_info (type, time, title, detail, create_time,update_time, link_url, newcode,is_del) values (#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM proj_dynamic_info WHERE is_del=0 AND id = #{id}
mapper.update: update proj_dynamic_info set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail=#{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, link_url=#{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
